entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage.SetTitleIconImageSource Cases crash on iOS #21518
  • On Android when you add a NavigationPage to the FlyoutPage.Flyout, an exception is thrown #21515
  • [Windows] Images should not cover text if they're too big inside a button #21513
    .NET 8 SR4
  • SetAppThemeColor crashes with NRE #21503
  • DisplayPromptAsync colors the background gray when entering values #21499
  • Bugzilla44166 now failing after ThemeResourcesChange fix #21495
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView items not resizing correctly when ItemsLayout is GridItemsLayout #21494

Closed

  • [BUG] Back button is not visible on the navigation bar in light mode #20811
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with ItemSpacing => Infinite layout loop Android #21379
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Bug] [Android] Modal page shows behind android navigation bar after navigating to another modal page and rotating screen on tablet only #20798
  • On Maui Android, page dimennsions are always empty #17154

PullRequests

Created

  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview3] Update preview3 versions #21514
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • [Trimming] Remove unnecessary regular expressions #21497
    area/app-size 🤏

Merged

  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100 preview4 #21510
  • [net9.0] Fix rollback for net9 #21512
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21511
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview3] [net9.0] Bump the reference to the net8.0 workload #21509
  • [net9.0] Bump the reference to the net8.0 workload #21508
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Make a green run for p3 before going to p4 #21500
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • Cleanup ResourceDictionary #21486
  • [Windows] Add crash dumps as artifacts to tests #21493
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing
  • Move 10234 to Appium #21471
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Ensure images in buttons never scale up, only down #21463
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • Add better exception if user opens second activity #21492
  • Create collect-dotnet-info.ps1 #21223
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [xaml] improve performance in debug-mode #21460
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add an API to allow registering TypeConverters for third-party types #21476
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [C] fix a leak in VSG #21484
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
